channel.title: Tablet on Shantanu Vs The World
channel.description: Recent content in Tablet on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: A short Tablet/Smartphone survey for a project
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: I need a bit of your help in filling out a short survey that I need for a small project of mine that I’m doing with a friend. It will take maximum of only 2-3 minutes of your time. Please fill it out below. If you are facing any problems with the survey or have any queries/suggestions etc, please use this contact form to send them to us. Much Thanks!! :)
item.content:
I need a bit of your help in filling out a short survey that I need for a small project of mine that I’m doing with a friend. It will take maximum of only 2-3 minutes of your time. Please fill it out below. If you are facing any problems with the survey or have any queries/suggestions etc, please use this contact form to send them to us.

Much Thanks!! :)
